description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the remote code execution vulnerability in the Windows Fax Service (CVE-2024-38104):

1. Download and apply the relevant updates based on your Windows version from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Ensure that your system is rebooted to complete the installation of updates and mitigate any potential risks.

**Details**:
- The following update packages should be installed:
  - [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442) for Windows 11 Version 23H2 and 22H2.
  - [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431) for Windows 11 Version 21H2.
  - [KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448) for Windows 10 (x64 and 32-bit).
  - [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427) for Windows 10 Version 22H2 and 21H2 (both x64 and 32-bit).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system matches one of the designated build numbers listed in the notification.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the updates.
